short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin returns the old 'drag and drop' friend invitation feature on Battlefield 4 Battlelog.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: New battlefield 4 battlelog has removed the the feature that allowed user to invite friends by simple drag and drop interface. This plugin allows user to get that feature back. It
